search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Mighty Networks (mightynetworks.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Mighty Networks is available at the following URL: [https://www.mightynetworks.com/pricing](https://www.mightynetworks.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Features

GET STARTED

![Image 1: move-to-mighty](https://images.ctfassets.net/m9n8o4ceoyuw/4fJ9jfZbU1tDxSURVcKw0c/9e7e5b52f41228ccba4d75001bba37c4/FMM_MoveToMighty.png?w=600&h=225&q=50&fm=png)

High churn? Low engagement? It's time to move to Mighty
-------------------------------------------------------

[Learn More](https://www.mightynetworks.com/migration)

[Branded Apps](https://www.mightynetworks.com/pro)[Services](https://www.mightynetworks.com/pro/services)

Resources

FEATURED

![Image 2: Unlock free masterclass](https://images.ctfassets.net/m9n8o4ceoyuw/66ZGleRAnX1VBb6v23bB9g/63f5402e24157cb722a9665a332b64f4/ResourcesPeopleMagic.png?w=600&h=544&q=50&fm=png)

Unlock our FREE Masterclass
---------------------------

Learn about the 9 SIMPLE STEPS to creating a community so valuable it could generate $1M in revenue and 99% profit margins with AI.

[Unlock the FREE Masterclass](https://www.mightynetworks.com/peoplemagic)

![Image 3: Join Mighty community](https://images.ctfassets.net/m9n8o4ceoyuw/3PGnHm6FoAh8yFxU4EYAnJ/4ecf0762ce573d87fb59e99351b9406b/ResourcesJoinCommunity.png?w=600&h=544&q=50&fm=png)

Join Mighty Community
---------------------

Learn the principles of Community Design™ (and see them in action) alongside thousands of creators and entrepreneurs. It's free to join!

[Join Now](https://community.mightynetworks.com/feed?utm_source=website&utm_medium=resources_menu&utm_campaign=mc_education)

[Pricing](https://www.mightynetworks.com/pricing)

Try our Business Plan for free for 14 days
------------------------------------------

We’ll even set it up for you. Just tell us who you’re bringing together and we’ll get you started with branding, a landing page, and your first spaces.

UNLIMITED
---------

*   Members
    
*   Spaces
    
*   Admins & Mods
    

UNIQUE TO MIGHTY
----------------

*   People magic AI
    
*   Multiple features per Space
    
*   Get started <60-seconds
    

Starts at

$41
---

Free for 14 days

You’ll be able to add content and events, create courses or challenges, set up payments, add branding, invite members, and more. We have a checklist in the admin area that will guide you through some easy first steps.

Features

Community

Courses

Business

Path-to-Pro

The Basics
----------

Mighty Co-Host™ Dynamic Set Up & AI Features

Mighty Co-Host™ is the first AI community builder powered by GPT-4 to help you create the community, courses, and memberships of your dreams in just a few minutes.

Hosts & Moderators

Hosts have full access to all settings, moderators to a more limited set of features. Add as many of each as you need.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Members

There’s no limit to how many members you can have in your Mighty Network.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Spaces

Similar to channels, organize your Mighty Network with unlimited Spaces and native features.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Available on iOS, Android & the Web

Your Mighty Network is available on the web and through our iOS and Android apps.

Charge for Access to Your Mighty Network or any Space

When you're ready, upgrade your Mighty Network to your own branded apps—without custom development or moving platforms

Courses
-------

Courses

Create a course in minutes with the option to add course content unlocks by date or by progress.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Course Communities

Add a thriving course community to any course to increase completion rates and results.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Instructors & Moderators

Instructors and moderators can edit course settings and/or lessons.

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

Native Video Upload in Courses

Quickly and easily add course videos to your lessons.

Quizzes & Tests

Add quizzes and testing to your courses.

Mighty Co-Host™ Instant Course Outline

Transform the seed of an idea into an outline using Mighty’s proven SPARK Course™ format and GPT-4.

Customization
-------------

Add Your Logo, Colors and Graphics

Custom Web Domain

Link an existing domain or buy a new one, right from your Mighty Network.

Custom Member Tags & Badges

White-Labeled Emails

Ability to add SSO

Custom Profile Fields

1

5

Unlimited

Unlimited

Custom Banners per Space

Automations
-----------

Course Feature Related Triggers & Actions

Triggers: Completing lessons, sections and quizzes Actions: Adding/removing Badges and Tags

Attendance Related Triggers & Actions

Triggers: Joining/leaving the Network and Spaces, RSVPing to Events, and more Actions: Inviting/removing from Space, opening or closing Event RSVPS

Activity & Content Related Triggers & Actions

Triggers: Posting, comments, answering Polls & Qs, new Ambassador level Actions: Sending a DM

Integrations & Data
-------------------

Zoom Integration

This seamless integration works beautifully on web and mobile apps. Just sync your Zoom account and it's ready.

Basic Mighty Insights™

An overview of your members and community that tells you what’s working and what’s not.

Premium Mighty Insights™

A deep dive into your members, cohorts,. and Spaces.

Member Data Download

You can export your member data, including email addresses.

ConvertKit Integration

Mighty is the only community and course platform with a seamless integration to ConvertKit’s email and marketing platform.

API Integrations Via Zapier

Connect your Mighty Network to thousands of other business tools.

Google Analytics Integration

Track traffic and behavior in your Mighty Network on the Google Analytics platform.

Community & Gamification
------------------------

Questions & Polls

Harness the power of Questions & Polls to prompt members to share their stories, ideas, and experiences in one of the most popular community features of a Mighty Network.

Leaderboards

Coming Soon

Streaks

Points & Recognition

Online & In-Person Events

Create one-off or recurring offline or online events, track RSVPs, sync to calendars, and remind members.

Built-In Member Ambassador Referral Program

Use the built-in ambassador program to encourage existing members to invite new ones.

Intuitive People Explorer to Find Relevant Members

Top Contributors Display

Chat Spaces

Easily create dedicated Chat Spaces and stay on top of activity with push notifications.

Direct Messaging

It's easy for individuals or a few members to connect in a casual chat, directly from your Mighty Network.

Articles & Quick Posts

Quickly share a note, video, photo, or link with your Mighty Network.

Native Video

Hosts can record and upload 4GB video directly to your Mighty Network.

Marketing Pages

Create freeform marketing or informational pages within any Space.

Resources & Structured Content

Use the Table of Contents feature in any Space to set up easily accessible resources or other structured content.

Automated Questions & Polls via the Infinite Question Engine

Member Video Upload

Total Storage

Store and share recorded livestreams along with other videos, photos, and documents.

250 GB

1 TB

2 TB

3 TB

Livestreaming
-------------

Multiple Onscreen Speakers

Offer live meet and greets, Q&A sessions and more.

Simultaneous Livestreaming Events

Streaming Hours Per Month

Go live directly from your Mighty Network or any Space.

5 Hours

20 Hours

30 Hours

40 Hours

Viewers per Stream

Grow your streaming audience with ease.

50 Viewers

200 Viewers

500 Viewers

1000 Viewers

Allow Space Hosts and Moderators to Go Live

Payments
--------

Create Multiple Tiers and Payment Plans

Choose Subscription or One-Time Payments

Run individual or bundled annual or monthly subscriptions, or charge a one-time fee.

Charge in Hundreds of Different Currencies

Choose from over 135 local currencies for your paid plans.

Charge for Online Courses

Charge for an unlimited number of individual online courses within your Mighty Network.

Charge for One-Time Events

Set up and charge for access to an individual event.

Transaction Fees

Mighty charges a small fee on each transaction.

3%

2%

2%

1%

Services & Support
------------------

In-product customer support

Access to an exclusive community

Dedicated support & strategy team

Community Design™ consult

Mighty Pro Design Studio™ brand package

Your own app is easier to sell, discover, & share
-------------------------------------------------

Mighty Pro apps have higher engagement and revenue than communities on our other plans. Branded apps just work—and we set you up for success right out of the gate.

Get everything on our other tiers plus...
-----------------------------------------

*   Your Own iOS & Android Apps
*   Branded App Notifications
*   Free Member and Payment Migration
*   Community Strategy & Setup
*   Branding & Graphic Design Support (Optional)
*   The Mighty Pro Membership (Optional)

[Request a Call](https://www.mightynetworks.com/request-a-call-form)

Learn more about Mighty Pro and schedule a call with our team.

![Image 4: branded apps](https://images.ctfassets.net/m9n8o4ceoyuw/66WCZxcGy86YojZyxlrw6z/4f6f7d80989e5a151d87701908f79842/Pricing_page_Pro_ad__1_.png?w=1100&h=1045&q=50&fm=png)

![Image 5: migration-page-image](https://images.ctfassets.net/m9n8o4ceoyuw/6HNuWrHgC9JlyQAxTLNbIQ/416e07f993dbb08051389a3229536108/Pricing_Migration__1_.png?w=1500&h=1242&q=50&fm=png)

Want to move to Mighty?
-----------------------

We’ve moved thousands of courses, communities, and challenges just like yours. Let us show you what’s possible on a Mighty Network.

Let us seamlessly migrate your...
---------------------------------

*   Members
    
*   Content
    
*   Courses & Challenges
    
*   Payments
    

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Can I talk to a real person at Mighty?

What do I have access to on a free trial?

How do I set up a Mighty Network?

I’m new to community building–where do I go if I need strategy help?

What can I charge for on Mighty—and how much can I charge?

What kind of people and brands use Mighty?

Start your free trial
---------------------

Who do you want to bring together?

Examples: coaching clients, meditation novices, vegan chefs, dog lovers, aspiring entrepreneurs, etc.

Whether you're just starting out or ready to scale, there's a plan for you. Start your free trial now, no credit card required.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual billing offers a discount equivalent to two months free.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Start a community or move one over from a social media group or a chat app.
Add courses, challenges, and resource libraries to a community or membership.
Integrate your community with your other tools and take advantage of more livestreaming and white-labeling.
Grow your revenue and scale with dedicated services and support, more white-labeling, and our most advanced automated workflows.

additional_fees.fee_description: Mighty charges a small fee on each transaction for the Community Plan.
Mighty charges a small fee on each transaction for the Courses and Business Plans.
Mighty charges a small fee on each transaction for the Path-to-Pro Plan.
